001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.cart_discount;
003
004public interface CartDiscountValueMixin {
005    default CartDiscountValueDraft toDraft() {
006        if (this instanceof CartDiscountValueAbsolute) {
007            return ((CartDiscountValueAbsolute) this).toDraft();
008        }
009        if (this instanceof CartDiscountValueFixed) {
010            return ((CartDiscountValueFixed) this).toDraft();
011        }
012        if (this instanceof CartDiscountValueRelative) {
013            return ((CartDiscountValueRelative) this).toDraft();
014        }
015        if (this instanceof CartDiscountValueGiftLineItem) {
016            return ((CartDiscountValueGiftLineItem) this).toDraft();
017        }
018        throw new IllegalArgumentException("can't convert cart discount to draft");
019    }
020}
